tooltips.FAST_AND_FURIOUS: Project that is moving fast with a lot of contributions completed.
tooltips.HOT_COMMUNITY: Project that has a high number of active contributors.
tooltips.LIKELY_TO_REWARD: Project that can reward a work well done.
tooltips.NEWBIES_WELCOME: Project that onboard new contributors regularly.
tooltips.UPDATED_ROADMAP: Project presenting the most recent challenges.
tooltips.WORK_IN_PROGRESS: Project that has open issues ready to tackle.
